about_the_game:
This is the third chapter of the visual novel One Day in London.

Mystical events unfold in London. There is no more way back...
New losses lead Jeremy to new achievements, as the lines of the story twine into a fascinating canvas. He will have to face his fears soon. What lies in store for him? It is up to you to decide, dear reader. Keep your eyes open: sometimes it takes but a single word to change the whole story!

Discover what happens next to Jeremy in the new episode!

  • 6 to 14 hours of gameplay!
  • New mini-games
  • New characters
  • More rituals
  • And many, many different story options!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 2.33 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/Win 7/Win 8
  • Processor: 2.33+ Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Better than Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compliant

short_description: The third chapter continues the story of the visual novel One Day in London. Find out what happens after the events in the Bethlehem hospital...
